Description: NO FEE AVAIL 9/1. Super bright and spacious 4 bedroom apartment with hardwood floors, large patio, laundry in the building and in an awesome location Great size bedrooms and it's in the BEST location of South Boston. Large eat in kitchen with pantry and living room is GREAT SIZE Outdoor space is huge and laundry East side walking distance to all of the bars and restaurants Broadway has to offer and can get to the beach in less than five minutes. Distant water views from living room! Don't want to miss Available September 1st!
